Module azcam.tools.ascom.tempcon_ascom

Contains the TempConASCOM class.

Classes

class TempConASCOM (tool_id='tempcon', description=None)

Temperature control class for cameras using ASCOM.

Creates the tool.

Args

tool_id
Name of tool
description
Description of tool, defaults to tool_id.

Ancestors

  • TempCon
  • Tools
  • ObjectHeaderMethods

Inherited from: TempCon.enabled

1 when tool has been initialized

Inherited from: TempCon.tool_id

verbosity for debug, >0 is more verbose
